Sentence.sentence: There's work to be done, but workers aren't ready to do it—they're in the wrong places, or they have the wrong skills.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is beneficial to encourage young people to explore the broader world and get ready to make it a better place.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It was about ready to start regular business.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: not everybody is willing or ready to respond
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The third rule is to be ready to cite options and consequences.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Just one week after Obama was elected president, participants were less ready to support policies designed to address racial inequality than they had been two weeks before the election.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A negative side of the Obama effect is that people are now less ready to support policies addressing racial inequality.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: people are now less ready to support policies addressing racial inequality.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Delia had anticipated this question and had an answer ready.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She has not got the man's copies ready.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why the pictures are not ready.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The pictures we took at the botanical garden should be ready tomorrow
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A season in the field will help determine which, if any, of the varieties are ready for commercialization.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And it's never too early to get ready for the inevitable.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And when we get off the plane, instead of being depleted, we feel recovered and ready to return to the performance zone.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I'm just getting ready to go home.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Once the final charts and tables are ready, I have to check them and organize a presentation.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Still, Liu isn't ready to endorse the habit of sleeping less and making up for it later.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 雷迪绰号，有先见之明者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“有准备的”(prepared)
[人名] [苏格兰人姓氏] 雷迪住所名称，语源不详
[人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 雷迪盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于人名，含义是“活泼的”(spirited)

Sentence.sentence: Again, not a move, the next time, I had my camera ready to record what you see here, one of several dozen such pictures, so long as she had a slice to eat, she never bothered the one on her head.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Are you ready to go now?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But Cathy woke me up early next morning, wearing her swimsuit ready to go! I told her she shouldn't swim after a whole night's coughing, but she refused to give up and insisted she go.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Exercising makes you more awake and ready to handle whatever is ahead of you for the day.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: I was ready to pay for my bananas at the grocery one night, when fear seized me.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I woke up sweating and nervous, but ready to prove something to myself.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'm ready for the real world.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Keith Robinson, the author of the study, said, "I really don't know if the public is ready for this but there are some ways parents can be involved in their kids' education that leads to declines in their academic performance."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Now you are ready out a goal of improving distance and time.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 选项

Sentence.sentence: One of the first things maxime used to do with Shelly-Ann was taking her to the track, and she was ready to sacrifice everything.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Papa would listen carefully and was ready with some comment, always to the point.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Papa, at the head of the table, would push back his chair and pour a glass of red wine, ready to listen.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Pheromones can signal that an animal is either ready to fight or is feeling open to partnerships.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Previous generations concentrated on getting children to school on time, fed, dressed and ready to learn.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sorry sir, your room will be ready soon.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Starting before you feel ready is one of the habits of successful people.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The moments when I think cooking is a pain are when I'm already hungry and there is nothing ready to eat.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The plants get ready to fight back.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: When berlin restaurant customers ate in darkness, they couldn't tell how much they'd had: those given extra-large shares ate more than everyone else, but were none the wiser—they didn't feel fuller, and they were just as ready for dessert.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Now the nation's top patent court appears completely ready to scale back on business-method patents, which have been controversial ever since they were first authorized 10 years ago.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But in Osborneland, your first instinct is to fall into dependency—permanent dependency if you can get it—supported by a state only too ready to indulge your falsehood.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In a Swiss study, researchers sprayed oxytocin into the noses of half the subjects; those subjects were ready to lend significantly higher amounts of money to strangers than were their counterparts who inhaled something else.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Now the nation's top patent court appears completely ready to scale back on business-method patents, which have been controversial ever since they were first authorized I0 years ago.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 准备就绪的；准备好；准备完毕

sentences.en: He bade us keep in a ready posture.
sentences.cn: 他嘱咐我们做好准备。

sentences.en: Please get the plates ready.
sentences.cn: 请备好碟子。

means.word_mean: 乐意的, 情愿的，愿意迅速做某事（或给某物），急于行动

sentences.en: John is always ready with advice.
sentences.cn: 约翰总是乐于给人出主意。

sentences.en: He was quite polite, but he wasn't ready to help me.
sentences.cn: 他相当有礼貌, 但他并不愿意帮我。

sentences.en: He is a ready writer.
sentences.cn: 他是一位才思敏捷的作家。

means.word_mean: 1 已完成；准备好；可利用 2 方便使用的；现成的 3  马上要，很可能即将（做某事）4  急需；需尽快得到
做好…的准备；（为…）做好准备

data.mean: ready to roll 准备开始；就要开始

sentence.cn: 我准备好面对现实世界了。
sentence.en: I'm ready for the real world.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

jx.jx_en_mean: used to announce the beginning of a race

jx.jx_cn_mean: 可立即使用的：立即可以投入使用的

lj.lj_ly: soldiers with machine guns at the ready; students with notebooks at the ready.
lj.lj_ls: 配备有机枪的士兵们；准备好笔记本的学生们

entry.def: If someone is ready, they are properly prepared for something. If something is ready, it has been properly prepared and is now able to be used.
entry.tran: （人）准备就绪的;（物品）准备好的

example.ex: It took her a long time to get ready for church...
example.tran: 她花了很长时间才做好去教堂的准备。

example.ex: The cocaine was ready for distribution...
example.tran: 那些可卡因已经准备好进行分销了。

entry.def: If you are ready for something or ready to do something, you have enough experience to do it or you are old enough and sensible enough to do it.

example.ex: She says she's not ready for marriage...
example.tran: 她说自己还没有准备好结婚。

example.ex: You'll have no trouble getting him into a normal school when you feel he's ready to go.
example.tran: 当你觉得他可以应付的时候再把他弄进一所普通学校是不会有问题的。

entry.def: If you are ready to do something, you are willing to do it.
entry.tran: 愿意的；乐意的；情愿的；甘愿的

example.ex: They were ready to die for their beliefs...
example.tran: 他们甘愿为信仰而死。

example.ex: She was always ready to give interviews.
example.tran: 她一向乐意接受采访。

entry.def: If you are ready for something, you need it or want it.

example.ex: I don't know about you, but I'm ready for bed...
example.tran: 我不知道你怎样，但是我要睡觉了。

example.ex: After five days in the heat of Bangkok, we were ready for the beach.
example.tran: 在曼谷的炎热天气中呆了5天之后，我们想要去海边。

entry.def: To be ready to do something means to be about to do it or likely to do it.

example.ex: She looked ready to cry...
example.tran: 她看起来要哭了。

example.ex: Just as we were ready to sit down to dinner, a little boy came running in...
example.tran: 正当我们要吃晚餐的时候，一个小男孩跑着进来了。

entry.def: You use ready to describe things that are able to be used very quickly and easily.
entry.tran: 现成的;就绪的;易于得到的

example.ex: I didn't have a ready answer for this dilemma...
example.tran: 我没有想出解决这个困境的现成答案。

example.ex: 'But not quite yet,' he says quickly, with that ready smile of his...
example.tran: “但还不至于如此，”他脱口而出，脸上保持着他那一贯的微笑。

entry.def: Ready money is in the form of notes and coins rather than cheques or credit cards, and so it can be used immediately.

example.ex: I'm afraid I don't have enough ready cash.
example.tran: 恐怕我身上没有足够的现金。

entry.def: When you ready something, you prepare it for a particular purpose.

example.ex: John's soldiers were readying themselves for the final assault...
example.tran: 约翰的手下正在为最后的进攻做准备。

example.ex: In Egypt, two new camps were readied for the absorption of refugees...
example.tran: 在埃及，两个新的营地已经准备好收留难民了。

entry.def: Ready combines with past participles to indicate that something has already been done, and that therefore you do not have to do it yourself.
entry.tran: （与过去分词连用）表示“已经…好的”，“事先…的”

example.ex: You can buy ready-printed forms for wills at stationery shops...
example.tran: 你可以在文具店买到已印好的遗嘱单。

example.ex: If you buy the fish ready filleted, make sure the flesh is firm and springy.
example.tran: 如果你要买已经片好的鱼片，一定要买鱼肉紧实有弹性的。

entry.def: If you have something at the ready, you have it in a position where it can be quickly and easily used.
entry.tran: 现成的；可以立即使用的；在手边的

example.ex: Soldiers came charging through the forest, guns at the ready.
example.tran: 荷枪实弹的士兵穿过林区冲了上来。

entry.def: If you want to emphasize that a person is properly prepared for something, or that something can now be used, you can say that they are ready and waiting .

example.ex: She liked to be ready and waiting at home when Bernard returned from work...
example.tran: 她想在伯纳德下班回家的时候把一切准备就绪。

example.ex: The chalet was kept ready and waiting for them at all times.
example.tran: 小屋已收拾好随时迎接他们的到来。

entry.def: If you say to someone 'Ready when you are', you are telling them that you are now ready to do something and that as soon as they are ready, you will do it.
entry.tran: 已经准备就绪；就等你先开始

example.ex: 'Are you ready to pull out?' — 'I'm ready when you are, Captain.'
example.tran: “准备好出发了吗?”——“就等你了，船长。”

means.word_mean: 1. prepare for eating by applying heat;
2. make ready or suitable or equip in advance for a particular purpose or for some use, event, etc;

sentences.sentence: "I was fixing to leave town after I paid the hotel bill"

means.word_mean: 1. completely prepared or in condition for immediate action or use or progress;

sentences.sentence: "the soup will be ready in a minute"
"he seems to have ample ready money"

means.word_mean: 5. apprehending and responding with speed and sensitivity;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old English rǣde (from a Germanic base meaning 'arrange, prepare'; related to Dutch gereed) + -y

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 雷迪绰号，有先见之明者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“有准备的”(prepared)

sentences.en: 'Are you ready to pull out?' — 'I'm ready when you are, Captain.'

sentences.cn: 这太远了,我几乎没有准备好的部队来防守它.
sentences.en: It was too and I had too few ready troops to hold them off.

sentences.cn: 我很快会把今晚的一切准备好的? 你们把化妆室准备好了 吗 ?
sentences.en: I soon have everything ready for tonight? You did get the list for the dressing room?

sentences.cn: 请等一等,我立即就准备好的.
sentences.en: Give me a minute and I'll be ready.

sentences.cn: 礼拜完成后, 他被领到了一间准备好的房子里.
sentences.en: After the church service, he was conducted to a house ready prepared.

sentences.cn: 我连忙穿上一套为我准备好的蓝衣服.
sentences.en: I dressed speedily , in a suit of blue laid ready for me.

sentences.cn: 幸福永远在等待准备好的人,它会像一阵清风轻轻的飘. 把它翻译成英语?
sentences.en: Happiness always goes to those ready to and it to pass just like the breeze.

sentences.cn: 所有的部分都准备好的, 就调试系统.
sentences.en: Once all the component parts are ready, the system is tested.

sentences.cn: 知识 、 合约 、 物品、技艺都是上天为他准备好的东西, 无需烦恼.
sentences.en: Knowledge, contract, product , craft and technique are naturally ready for him . He doesn't need to worry.

sentences.cn: 在你清楚你已经准备好的情况下你会更有信心的接近这个任务.
sentences.en: You'll approach the task more confidently knowing that you're ready.

sentences.cn: 如果他已经用过了PVP饰品,而且你有着准备好的满能量连续技.
sentences.en: If he already blew his PVP trinket and your have a full energy stunlock ready.

sentences.cn: 帽子和汽球都是准备好的.冰淇淋和蛋糕也是准备好的.
sentences.en: The hats and balloons are ready The ice cream and cake are ready.

sentences.cn: 准备好的人, 请举手.
sentences.en: Those who are ready, please raise your hand.

sentences.cn: 敌人总会在以下两种情况发生时展开攻击: 1他们准备好的时候;2你没准备好的时候.
sentences.en: The enemy invariably attacks on two occasions: a . When they're ready . b . When you're not.

sentences.cn: 德里克.斯: 2月15日前会准备好的.
sentences.en: DEREK JONES: It will be ready for February 15 th.

sentences.cn: 强盗迅速跳进准备好的汽车匆匆离去.
sentences.en: The robber hopped in to his ready car and rushed off.

sentences.cn: 哪时想结婚: 当我准备好的时候.
sentences.en: When I want to get married: when I'm ready and my life is all in order.

sentences.cn: 我会在几天内准备好的.
sentences.en: I'll have it ready in a couple of days.

sentences.cn: 照片显示罗伯特.哈维金斯带着准备好的枪支, 直接走入一家百货商店.
sentences.en: The pictures show Robert Hawkins with his gun at the ready, walking through a department store.

sentences.cn: 你们的餐点很快就会准备好的.
sentences.en: Your meal will be ready soon.

sentences.cn: 主任正在询问你答应准备好的那些文件.
sentences.en: The director is asking about those papers that you promised to have ready.

sentences.cn: 在想法中失去, 我进入准备好的房间之内踏并且停止.
sentences.en: Lost in thought, I stepped into the ready room and stopped.

sentences.cn: 在独立的质量管理人员到达之时,中国境内的设备应该是准备好的, 并且喷涂完毕已干燥的.
sentences.en: The equipment in China should be ready, painted and dry when the independent QC man arrives.

sentences.cn: 你没准备好的时候,我是不愿打开饭盒子的.
sentences.en: I have not wished to open the container until you were ready.

sentences.cn: 8点钟敲我的窗，我会准备好的。
sentences.en: Knock at my window at eight o'clock and I'll be ready.

sentences.cn: 现成的木材供应
sentences.en: a ready supply of wood

sentences.cn: 现成的收入来源
sentences.en: a ready source of income

sentences.cn: 现成的饭菜
sentences.en: ready-cooked meals

sentences.cn: 你的外套是定做的还是买现成的?
sentences.en: Is your overcoat made to order or ready made?

sentences.cn: 而不是提供现成的答案.
sentences.en: Philosophy is under no obligation to furnish ready and handy answers.

sentences.cn: 这个户头为你提供了一个现成的收入来源.
sentences.en: This account provides you with a ready source of income.

sentences.cn: 它包括一部分现成的作品,也有一部分专门制作的作品.
sentences.en: It included some ready works and also some specially made works.

sentences.cn: 每次, 它们都有一个现成的替罪羊——政府.
sentences.en: In each case, they have a ready scapegoat – the government.

sentences.cn: 人类已经没有时间弄明白事情, 他们总是去商店里购买现成的商品.
sentences.en: Men have no time to understand anything. They buy things all ready made at the shops.

sentences.cn: 你有没有现成的供应品?
sentences.en: Do you have ready supplies?

sentences.cn: 我们买食品, 也像买衣服一样,都是已经弄好的, 现成的.
sentences.en: We buy our food, like our clothing, ready made and off the rack.

sentences.cn: 起初, 没有现成的技术资料, 但我们设法干下去了.
sentences.en: At fires, no ready technical data were available, but we managed to go without.

sentences.cn: 热心的党人是能够向你提出一套现成的答案的.
sentences.en: Eager partisans could supply you with a stock of ready answers.

sentences.cn: 他妻子始终是现成的现金来源.
sentences.en: His wife was always a good source of ready cash.

sentences.cn: 所有这些结论都是现成的.
sentences.en: All these conclusions are ready.

sentences.cn: 你的衣服是定做的还是买现成的?
sentences.en: Are your clothes made to order or ready made?

sentences.cn: 热心的党人是能够向你提供一套现成的答案的, 可是这些答案始终很难令人满意.
sentences.en: Eager partisans could supply you with a stock of ready answers, but these remained highly unsatisfactory.

sentences.cn: 每个难题有你装的一个 现成 的解决方案如果你被刺.
sentences.en: Each puzzle has a ready - made solution which you load if you get stuck.

sentences.cn: 海边鱼市是觅食海鸟现成的食物供应地.
sentences.en: The seaside fish market is a ready food supply for scavenging seabirds.

sentences.cn: 他是个粗犷而敏捷的足球运动员.
sentences.en: He is a rough and ready football player.

sentences.cn: 他是一位才思敏捷的作家.
sentences.en: He is a ready writer.

sentences.cn: 他是个生龙活虎的小家伙,有敏捷的理解能力.
sentences.en: He was a vigorous animal with a ready understanding.

sentences.cn: 用预先调配按摩油,可选择个人配方,适合不同需要.
sentences.en: Ready blended oil at a choice of Individual blending with consultation.

sentences.cn: 你若预先通知我, 我就能给您准备好了.
sentences.en: If you warn me in advance, I will have your order ready for you.

sentences.cn: 爱尔兰威士忌一款以平顺著称的传统爱尔兰片烟,已预先替您揉好,方便随时享用.
sentences.en: Irish Whiskey A traditional Irish ready rubbed blend renowned for it's smooth smoking quality.

sentences.cn: 我们要预先准备好旅行所必需的东西.
sentences.en: We'd better get the requisites for a trip ready beforehand.

Sentence.sentence: Regardless of your stated preference, if you're ready to quit, quitting abruptly is more effective, says Dr.

Sentence.sentence: In a sense, forgetting is our brain's way of sorting memories, so the most relevant memories are ready for retrieval.

Sentence.sentence: Creating the future you want is a lot easier if you are ready to exploit the opportunities that come your way.

Sentence.sentence: The shorthand ( ' ,  简写) educators use for this is pre-K —meaning instruction before kindergarten—and the big idea is to prepare 4-year-olds and even younger kids to be ready to succeed on their K-12 journey.

Sentence.sentence: Some show up ready, but many do not at this critical time when young brains are developing rapidly.

Sentence.sentence: Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open.

Sentence.sentence: The man's apartment is ready for rent.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Is everything ready for the conference?

Sentence.sentence: He is always ready to offer help to others

Sentence.sentence: Someone ready to take on more responsibilities.

Sentence.sentence: And this week, dozens of those students are getting ready to head out to Nashville, Tennessee to compete with about 5000 other young people at the Super Nationals of Chess.

Sentence.sentence: In contrast,  California, home of Silicon Valley, recently proposed far more restrictive rules that would require human drivers be ready to take the wheel, and ban commercial use of self-driving technology.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Juices are quick and easy to prepare, you can take the frozen fruit out the night before and have it ready the next morning.

Sentence.sentence: Lawmakers in Michigan clearly want to make the state ready for the commercial application of self-driving technology.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: No longer have we the inclination to let ourselves wander through fields of knowledge, ready to be surprised.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: similar shares say electorate and corporate America are just not ready to put more women in top leadership positions.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: That sounds tempting, but I won't be ready till 5, as I've got my statistic seminar now.

Sentence.sentence: The shorthand educators use for this is "pre-K"—meaning instruction before kindergarten—and the big idea is to prepare 4-year-olds and even younger kids to be ready to succeed on their K-12 journey.
